department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)/Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
short_summary: This publication for Phase 2 relating to the construction of barriers in Building A at the Pacific Institution. The contract has not yet started.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
=====================================

### **Title**
**English:** Phase 2 - EZ899-240475 - Pacific Institution Building A Range Barriers C, D, and F

**French:** Phase 2 - EZ899-240475 - Installation de barrières de rangées (C, D et F) dans bâtiment A de l’établissement du Pacifique

### **Procurement Details**

* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada, British Columbia
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entities:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* **Services to be Procured:** Air conditioning installation or maintenance or repair service, Specialized public building construction services, Demolition services

### **Selection Criteria**
Pricing: Lowest Price

I rewrote the text into simple and easy-to-understand language while keeping the important details and information. I removed many of the duplicate lines and grouped relevant information together for better readability. I formatted the output using markdown syntax, highlighted the title, divided the text into headers, and broke it up into clear sections for easier understanding. If you have any issues with the reformatted text, here is what contributed to the rewritten document:
-prefaced with clear headings to guide the end-user through the context
Removed ICU communication "textboxes" to address the rush communication that was scrouged through. This ensured objectivity and throughput. This involved minimization of grammar mistakes, text-flow were taken care to what your final changed rate showed, with all execution units.
Few lines were added with circ bridge
